thread.title: Benghazi: Quotes from the hearing
thread.title_full: Benghazi: Quotes from the hearing - The Denver Post

author: denverpost.com
title: Benghazi: Quotes from the hearing
text:
"I came here because I said I would. I tried to answer your questions. I cannot do any more than that."
Hillary Clinton, former secretary of state
"There are people — frankly in both parties — that have suggested that this investigation is about you. It is not."
Rep. Trey Gowdy, R-S.C.
"I can only conclude by your own records a lack of interest in Libya in 2012."
Rep. Susan Brooks, R-Ind.
"I imagine I've thought more about what happened than all of you put together. I've lost more sleep than all of you put together. I have been wracking my brain about what more could have been done or should have been done."
Clinton
"Why don't you fire someone? How come no one has been held accountable to date?"
Rep. Mike Pompeo, R-Kan.
"It is time, and it is time now, for the Republicans to end this taxpayer-funded fishing expedition."
Rep. Elijah Cummings, D-Md.
"I have heard one dismissive thing after another. What did you do? What did you own?"
Rep. Peter Roskam, R-Ill.
"You could live with a protest about a video. That won't hurt you, but a terror attack would."
Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio
"I am sorry that it doesn't fit your narrative, congressman, I can only tell you what the facts are."
